SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddCommentCommand
The AddCommentCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to add a comment to a film.
AddFilmCommand
The AddFilmCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to add a film.
AddToCartCommand
The AddToCartCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to add a film to the cart.
BuyFilmsCommand
The BuyFilmsCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to buy films from the user's cart.
Command
Interface for implementing command classes.
CommandException
The CommandException class represents an exception that occurs during command processing.
CommandHelper
Helper class for managing and retrieving command instances.
CommandName
Enum representing the available command names in the application.
Comment
Class representing a comment.
ConnectionPool
The ConnectionPool class represents a connection pool for managing database connections.
Controller
The Controller class is a servlet that handles HTTP requests and delegates the processing to the appropriate command.
DBDao
The DBDao interface defines methods for interacting with the database.
DBDaoException
The DBDaoException class represents an exception that occurs during database DAO (Data Access Object) operations.
DBDaoFactory
Factory class for creating instances of DBDao implementations.
DBDaoFactory.DaoType
Enumeration of available DaoTypes.
DeleteCommentCommand
The DeleteCommentCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to delete a comment from a film.
DeleteFilmCommand
The DeleteFilmCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to delete a film from the system.
DeleteFromCartCommand
The DeleteFromCartCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to delete a film from the user's cart.
DislikeCommand
The DislikeCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to dislike a review.
EditCommentCommand
The EditCommentCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to edit a comment.
EditFilmCommand
The EditFilmCommand class represents a command to edit a film in the system.
EditSaleCommand
The EditSaleCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to edit the sale of a user in the system.
ExitListener
Application Lifecycle Listener implementation class ExitListener
Film
Class representing a film.
LangBundle
Class for retrieving the resource bundle based on the language stored in the HttpSession.
LanguageChangeFilter
The LanguageChangeFilter class is a filter that handles language change in the application.
LikeCommand
The LikeCommand class represents a command to add or update the likes of a comment/review in the system.
LogoutCommand
The LogoutCommand class represents a command to log out a user from the system.
MySqlDBDao
The MySqlDBDao class is an implementation of the DBDao interface that provides access to a MySQL database for retrieving and modifying various objects related to films, users, and comments.
Page
This class defines the page URLs used in the application.
ProjectException
The ProjectException class represents a generic exception for the project.
RegistrationCommand
The RegistrationCommand class represents a command to register a new user in the system.
ShowEditCommentCommand
The ShowEditCommentCommand class represents a command to show the form for editing a comment.
ShowEditFilmCommand
The ShowEditFilmCommand class represents a command to show the edit film form.
ShowEditSaleCommand
The ShowEditSaleCommand class represents a command to show the edit sale form.
SignInCommand
The SignInCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to sign in a user.
ToAdminCommand
The ToAdminCommand class implements the Command interface and represents a command to navigate to the admin page.
ToCartCommand
The ToCartCommand class implements the Command interface and is responsible for executing a command to retrieve a user's cart information.
ToFilmCommand
The ToFilmCommand class implements the Command interface and is responsible for executing a command to retrieve film information and comments.
ToMainCommand
Command that handles navigation to the main page.
ToRegistrationCommand
Command that handles navigation to the registration page.
ToSignInCommand
Command that handles navigation to the sign-in page.
ToUserCommand
Command that handles displaying films to the user.
UnknownCommand
Command that handles unknown commands.
User
Class representing a user.
